product_name: Sprigs Cable Knit Snowflake Earbags - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Keep your ears toasty without the bulk of a hat or headband thanks to the minimal design and snuggly warmth of the Sprigs Cable Knit Snowflake earbags. Earbags wrap a layer of Thinsulate(TM)-lined fleece insulation around your ears to keep the cold out. Polyester knit exterior with snowflake design. Overstock.
short_description: Keep your ears toasty without the bulk of a hat or headband thanks to the minimal design and snuggly warmth of the Sprigs Cable Knit Snowflake earbags.
